name: Radial Jump
description:
Radial Jump is a short student game inspired by Portal, where you collect different guns that allow you to solve puzzles. Controls :
  • Move : Z / Q / S / D
  • Primary Shot : Left Click
  • Secondary Shot : Right Click
  • Left hand menu : Maintain A
  • Right hand menu : Maintain E
  • Show / Hide left equipment : A
  • Show / Hide right equipment : E
